basics.name: Dirk-Jan van der Plas
basics.label: DevOps Engineer | Cloud Engineer | Kubernetes Engineer
basics.summary: I'm a engineer who's specialized in building & maintaining platforms, either in the cloud (AWS & Azure) or on Kubernetes (AWS, Azure & On-premises). I am very focussed around delivering neccesary bussines value while constantly asking myself the why and for who are we building this question.

work.name: Nationale Nederlanden
work.summary: Responsible for everything containers & kubernetes related at Nationale Nederlanden. With a main priority of makeing the platform more managable by using the "heavy lifting" of the cloud providers.
highlights: Maintaining a cloud native kubernetes platform on AWS & Azure
Transform a static platform into a product for customers with AWS CDK
Support & advice customers with creating High-Available container solutions on Kubernetes

work.name: ChannelEngine
work.summary: Responsible for the on-premise infrastructure (Windows server, Redis, RabbitMq & Elastic Search). Working on a migration project to host the on-premise infrastructure on Azure.
highlights: Create a landing zone for the company in Azure
